item.title: MasterChef KPTR
item.dc:creator: viji
item.description:
KPTR Campus The MasterChef competition was held on the 26th of January 2023 as part of the  republic day celebrations. Residents from all the campuses  participated in this event. The competition was divided into three categories: The juniors, the seniors, and the Grand seniors. Winners were awarded attractive prizes

The post MasterChef KPTR appeared first on Campus Events.
item.content:encoded:
KPTR Campus

The MasterChef competition was held on the 26th of January 2023 as part of the  republic day celebrations. Residents from all the campuses  participated in this event. The competition was divided into three categories: The juniors, the seniors, and the Grand seniors. Winners were awarded attractive prizes

The post MasterChef KPTR appeared first on Campus Events.
